meanings.definition: Abnormal growth of eyelashes that turn inward towards the eye.
meanings.sent1: Trichiasis can cause discomfort by rubbing against the eye.
meanings.sent2: She visited the doctor to treat her trichiasis.
meanings.sent3: The little girl joked that her trichiasis made her eyelashes play peek-a-boo with her eyes.
meanings.sent4: His trichiasis turned his eyelashes into tiny hooks trying to catch his tears.
meanings.sent5: The image of trichiasis is like eyelashes on a mission to irritate the eye.

meanings.definition: A condition where eyelashes grow in an abnormal direction towards the eye.
meanings.sent1: Trichiasis can lead to eye infections if not treated.
meanings.sent2: The elderly lady struggled with trichiasis affecting her vision.
meanings.sent3: The trichiasis in the movie character's eyes made them look like they were winking all the time.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of eyelashes, trichiasis was the rebellious one growing towards the eye.
meanings.sent5: The trichiasis condition painted a vivid picture of eyelashes going rogue towards the eye.
